quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to make an effort to travel east. Then, go east. Once you manage that, try to travel south. And then, make an attempt to go west. After that, travel south. And then, venture east. Okay, and then, move south. With that done, make an attempt to take a trip west. Okay, and then, try to go south. Then, take the fly larva from the table. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. A normal one.

 You can make out a table. The table is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You are in a pantry. An ordinary one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just entered a washroom. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a canteen.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a steam room.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You are in a launderette. A typical one. The room is well lit.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You've seen better lounges, but at least this one seems pretty usual.



There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Of every sauna you could have walked into, you had to come round a normal one.

 You scan the room, seeing a board. The board is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the board you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You are in a dish-pit. An ordinary kind of place.

 Were you looking for a rack? Because look over there, it's a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe in the corner.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle.

 You scan the room, seeing a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is typical.[if there is something on the s_3] On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so ordinary all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the studio.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a type K locker. You wonder idly who left that here.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type K locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The type K locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a bedchamber.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You are in a cookery. A standard one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the restroom. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a case.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The case contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've entered an attic.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see a TextWorld style chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The TextWorld style chest contains [a list of things in the c_3]. You check the price tag that hangs off the TextWorld style chest. Forty big ones?! That's ridiculous! I know a person, their neighbour works for the mayor, who could get you one of those for 80 bucks![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The TextWorld style chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You're now in the kitchenette. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can see a bowl. The bowl is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bowl you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] The bowl appears to be empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. A standard one.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: it is what it is, a gateway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it's a robust portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: type K locker
infos.desc: The type K locker looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: TextWorld style chest
infos.desc: The TextWorld style chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: carrot
infos.desc: The carrot looks inviting.

infos.desc: that's an usual grape!

infos.desc: that's an ordinary gummy bear!

infos.desc: The durian looks tempting.

infos.desc: The stick of butter looks delicious.

infos.desc: The metal of the TextWorld style latchkey is satin.

infos.desc: The table is shaky.

infos.desc: The elderberry looks delicious.

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that ordinary thing.

infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: type K keycard
infos.desc: The type K keycard looks useful

infos.desc: The whisk appears to fit in here

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to attempt to venture east. If you can finish that, attempt to take a trip east. Once you accomplish that, travel south. And then, head west. And then, attempt to go to the south. Then, go to the east. Then, make an effort to move south. And then, make an effort to head west. That done, go south. After that, retrieve the fly larva from the table. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
